data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 28017, Version Hash: 5e4311f067e20e4ec6d120a3a7f6b31a6b5258eb
data.actual_result: The 3-dots menu doesn't show up, and I can't see who reacted to the message
data.expected_result: The 3-dots menu on a message from another user should appear so that I can see who reacted
data.short_description: The 3-dots menu doesn't show up when it is only supposed to have the Reactions option
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server check a channel where you can read messages - Hover a message from other user that has reactions - If you can see the 3 dots menu, click it, and try to disable everything else than the Reactions option; if you only see the Reactions option, then it's probably no repro - Also you should not have any manage message permissions
